hey vinod sorry to hear about the inconvenience you may be facing an issue while purchasing the ride pass because of the following reasons

 an outstanding charge needs to be cleared on your account
 the paytm authorization on your uber account may have expired

in order to purchase the ride pass we request you to clear the outstanding balance on your account

 try requesting a trip to generate the arrears prompt message
 clear the arrears using any noncash payment method available on your account

to reauthorize paytm on your uber account
 go to payment gt paytm
 a prompt will be generated to say that the authorization has expired 
 please reauthorize
you will receive an otp and once the otp is entered correctly you should be able to purchase the ride pass
